about_the_game:
Arcade Game Resource Pack is an RPG Maker official material collection of Resource, which are particular about the expression of pixel art.
You can use it to create arcade game scenes with action transitions, which can enrich your scene content and increase immersion.

■Used to enrich the map effects in your game
■Flexible standby or active animation
■Gorgeous action effect

【character】 (13 objects with 37 sheets)
Includes sample map (project data)

------------------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
